recipe_name: Spinach, orange and pine nut salad
author: Nick Nairn
method: Mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl and serve.
ingredients: 200g/7oz spinach leaves,  2 oranges, peeled and segmented,  100g/3Â½oz pine nuts, toasted in a frying pan until golden,  1 tomato, sliced,  2 tbsp olive oil
